UserCode.Interface

Interface iBehaviourFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BehaviourFactory

    public interface iBehaviourFactory
    iBehaviourFactory used to create the behaviour and pass in the required class to make the behaviour and assign to display
    Version:
    V2
    Author:
    Zaib Inamdar

      • createBehaviour

        <T extends iBehaviour> iBehaviour createBehaviour(java.lang.Class<T> bClass,
                                                  iDisplay display,
                                                  double[] pos)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method createBehaviour used to create the behaviour
        Parameters:
        bClass - A parameter which creates a new instance of the class passed from the parameter
        display - A parameter asign display to behaviour
        pos - A parameter pass a position to set the position of the behaviour
        Returns:
        The return behaviour created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
